audit.summary: Your page needs several SEO improvements. Prioritize the high-priority fixes to see significant gains.

categoryResults.label: Title Tag
categoryResults.shortExplanation: Title tag length is good but missing local keywords
categoryResults.fixRecommendation: Add your city or primary service to the title tag

checked: Contains city or primary service keyword

categoryResults.label: Meta Description
categoryResults.fixRecommendation: Add a meta description between 70-160 characters that includes your city or primary service

categoryResults.label: H1 Tag
categoryResults.shortExplanation: H1 tag exists but missing one keyword (service or city)
categoryResults.fixRecommendation: Add the missing keyword (city or primary service) to your H1 tag

checked: H1 contains primary service and city
evidence.notes: Input source: page URL fetch · Some themes inject H1 tags dynamically via JavaScript; this audit is based on the provided static HTML/content.

categoryResults.label: Heading Structure
categoryResults.shortExplanation: Has H3 headings but no H2 headings (weak structure)
categoryResults.fixRecommendation: Add H2 headings to create a logical content hierarchy

categoryResults.label: Content Length
categoryResults.shortExplanation: Content length is adequate (452 words, 600+ recommended)
categoryResults.fixRecommendation: Expand content to at least 600 words for better SEO

categoryResults.label: Images with Alt Text
categoryResults.fixRecommendation: Add alt text to 2 image(s) (aim for 80%+ coverage)

categoryResults.label: Internal Links
categoryResults.fixRecommendation: Add at least 3 internal links to other relevant pages on your site

categoryResults.label: Local Keywords
categoryResults.shortExplanation: Partial local keyword usage (city: 1x, state: 0x, service: 2x)
categoryResults.fixRecommendation: Increase local keyword usage: city 2+ times, state 1+ time, service in body

checked: Mentions city keyword ("Ocala") in body text
Mentions state keyword ("Florida") in body text
Mentions primary service keyword ("Plumbing") in body text
observed: Primary service found in body: Yes
evidence.notes: Input source: page URL fetch · Keyword detection is based on the extracted text from the provided HTML/content (not a live crawl).

categoryResults.label: Mobile-Friendly
categoryResults.fixRecommendation: Add viewport meta tag: <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

categoryResults.label: Conversion Signals
categoryResults.shortExplanation: Both CTA keywords and contact methods found
categoryResults.fixRecommendation: Maintain clear CTAs and contact methods

checked: Contact method present (tel:/mailto: link or /contact link)
evidence.notes: Input source: page URL fetch · Conversion signals are heuristic (keyword + link presence) and may not capture all CTA patterns.

roadmap.title: Fix Mobile-Friendly
roadmap.whyItMatters: Mobile-friendliness is a ranking factor and essential for user experience, as most searches happen on mobile.

roadmap.title: Fix Meta Description
roadmap.whyItMatters: Meta descriptions appear in search results and can significantly improve click-through rates when optimized.
nextSteps: Edit your page's meta description in the HTML head
Include your city or primary service

roadmap.title: Fix Internal Links
roadmap.whyItMatters: Internal linking helps search engines crawl and index your site better while distributing page authority.
nextSteps: Add links to other relevant pages on your site
Link to related services, about page, or contact page

roadmap.title: Fix Heading Structure
roadmap.whatIsWrong: Has H3 headings but no H2 headings (weak structure)
roadmap.whyItMatters: Good heading structure improves readability for users and helps search engines understand your content hierarchy.
nextSteps: Add H2 headings to break up content sections
Use H3 for subsections if needed

roadmap.title: Fix Content Length
roadmap.whatIsWrong: Content length is adequate (452 words, 600+ recommended)
roadmap.whyItMatters: Longer, comprehensive content tends to rank better and provides more value to visitors, supporting topical authority.
nextSteps: Expand content to at least 600 words
Add valuable, relevant information for your audience
Use headings to organize longer content
